Description:
It's BIG, BOLD and wants you to make it BEAUTIFUL!
It's a BIG house on a BIG block with a BIG garage just waiting for the BIG family! That's right, prime real estate of this size doesn't present itself too often, so when it does you move quickly on it. Good bones?... You bet it has! This original condition 5 bedroom, 2 bathroom, 4 car garage home on approx. 2727m2 has all the attributes to house that growing family whilst still having plenty of room to park all those cars and toys. Alternatively, it is just ripe for the picking to sub-divide, redevelop and reap the rewards (STCA).

Address: 3/174 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
Description:
Bigger and Better! To many features to mention
Investors, first home buyers and downsizers, look no further! This pristine unit located in the heart of Crib Point offers perfect opportunity to those looking for an easy, low maintenance lifestyle or those looking to set up a long term investment. While in close proximity to all the necessary amenities, local shops, schools and public transport; the quiet, peaceful lifestyle in Crib Point is attractive to all those who come through.
In great condition, this beautifully presented unit comprises of two bedrooms, both with built in robes. There is ducted heating and split system cooling throughout the property to keep you comfortable all year round. The fantastic living space is perfect for entertaining and relaxing. Including high ceilings throughout and a lock up garage, this home has everything you could ever need to enjoy a carefree lifestyle.
For more information or to book your private viewing, please call Jason Dowler anytime.

Description:
Family Haven In Leafy Surrounds
Showcasing the best attributes of low maintenance living combined with the privacy of a no-thru road, this much-loved family home is a compelling choice for investors, retirees and young families.
~ Set on a low-maintenance allotment of 612sqm (approx.)
~ 4 bedrooms; master features large ensuite and walk-in-robe.
~ Central kitchen offers gas cooking, island bench, Bosch dishwasher and ample cupboard space.
~ Two separate living areas, including front lounge and rear family room, both with gas heating and split system air conditioning.
~ Outdoor entertaining area, storage and plenty of space for the kids to play.
~ 16 solar panels, two garden sheds and two single carports ideal to store a boat/caravan.
Abundant in light and warmth, the size of the property is deceptive. Offering a quiet family retreat in this thriving community, the convenience of this prized locale is an unexpected bonus - only moments from shops, schools and public transport.

Description:
Investors And First Home Buyers - Pay attention!

The unit is one of 4 on the block and boasts high ceilings, square set cornice, stainless steel appliances and a modern, walk through bathroom.
There is also a lock up single garage with workshop space and a low maintenance back garden.

Description:
Affordable Body Corporate - Central Location
Calling all investors, downsizers and first home buyers, this pristine unit in Crib Point is the property you have been looking for. While nestled in a quiet and peaceful location, it is also moments away from all the necessary amenities, local schools, shopping centres and only a short drive to the Peninsula Link.
In fantastic condition, this unit comprises of 2 spacious bedrooms with built in robes, floating timber floors throughout and gas heating, to guarantee your comfort all year around. With the added bonus of the low Body Corporate rate; you will find it hard to compare this unit to anything else on the market.
With prices soaring and rental returns also rising, this is an outstanding investment opportunity or a great place to enter the home ownership market or retire. For more information or to organise a private viewing, please call Jason Dowler anytime.

Description:
Prime Position!
This well presented home is positioned in the beautifully tranquil township of Crib Point. Offering open plan living, complete with 4 bedrooms 2 large living areas, ensuite to main bedroom. Wood heater, ducted heating and split system air conditioning keeps you more than comfortable all year around. Sitting on approximately 1000m2, complete with double garage, shedding and sleep-out/teenage retreat. Sit back under the wrap around veranda and enjoy the country lifestyle. As part of this coastal community, your family can enjoy metropolitan train and local bus services, great local recreational facilities, including public swimming pools, two primary schools, footy and cricket clubs as well as the RSL. This certainly makes this a great place for the family to call home.

Description:
Enormous 1487sqm Block With Potential to Subdivide (STCA)
Peacefully placed in a leafy cul-de-sac with the Foreshore Reserve as its backdrop, this lovely home is ideal for developers, first home buyers and young families.
~ Extend, renovate or subdivide (S.T.C.A.) on approximately 1,487sqm.
~ No easements and side access to rear block.
~ 3 spacious bedrooms.
~ Combined dining and kitchen with overhead cupboards.
~ Original bathroom with separate bath and toilet.
~ Large family room offers split system air-conditioning, natural wood heater and built-in shelves.
~ Side access to single carport and shed with mechanics pit.
~ Tranquil outdoor entertaining area with park-like gardens, storage and garden shed.
Cater to your desire for privacy and spacious surrounds, whilst only moments from leading schools, shops and public transport.
Auction: Saturday, September 24th at 12:30pm.
Terms: 5%-10% Deposit, Flexible Settlement.
Vacant Possession.

Description:
Low Maintenance, Light-filled Unit With No Body Corporate Fees
Centrally located yet impressively quiet, this affordable unit enjoys a calming atmosphere among the Crib Point Foreshore Reserve.
An enticing investment prospect, its exceptional lifestyle address is mere footsteps from boutique shops, public transport and leading Primary Schools.
~ NE facing orientation with its own street frontage and no body corporate fees.
~ Two bedrooms with robes.
~ Spacious lounge with ceiling fan.
~ Combined kitchen and meals area with split-system air conditioning.
~ Main bathroom with art-deco vanity and separate bath.
~ Outdoor entertaining area, single garage with power and garden shed.
~ 750m to HMAS Cerberus Naval Base, 850m to the Recreation Centre and 210m to the RSL.

Description:
Quiet Convenient Townhouse
It is our pleasure to offer this delightful townhouse. The property comprises of 3 bedrooms, one with walk in robe and ensuite and the remaining with built in robes, open plan living/kitchen area and double remote garage. Featuring heating and cooling, spacious living area, quality appliances and fittings came as standard throughout. Located in a quiet development with close access to Crib Point and all the Peninsula offers. Excellent tenant in place on month to month. Paying $325 p/w. This property is suitable for 1st home buyer or investors looking to add to their investment portfolio. Inspection will not disappoint.

Description:
Timeless Character + Contemporary Comfort On ¼ Acre (Approx.)
Lovingly renovated with impeccable detail and style, this home has been masterfully transformed into a modern and sumptuous retreat.
Dressed in a contemporary palette of soft warm greys offset against timber inspired floors, it ticks every imaginable box in the lifestyle and home comfort categories.
~ Four bedrooms with robes; master suite offers spacious walk-in-robe and designer ensuite with free standing bath, quality fittings and walk-in shower.
~ Stylish family kitchen with breakfast bar, gas cooking and dishwasher.
~ Flaunting family-sized dimensions with two large living spaces, in-built wet bar and dining room.
~ Split system heating + cooling, ceiling fans and ducted heating.
~ Quality flooring and fixtures, storage and double garage under roofline.
~ Flowing out through sliding doors, the main living connects to an entertainer’s alfresco, sun-deck and immaculately maintained rear garden with a NE aspect.
~ Landscaped gardens, shed and ambient fire pit complete the idyllic outdoor package.
Enjoying a handy spot in this sought after suburb, everything you need is within arm’s reach – transport, shops, schools and a community with a big heart.

Description:
4 Bedroom Family Home
This four bedroom home with double carport under roof line has a very large secure yard and undercover outdoor area. The property comprises of the following: Main bedroom with en suite and walk in robe. Remaining three bedrooms with built in robes. Separate formal lounge/dining, kitchen/meals area and family room. Kitchen with gas and electric appliances including dishwasher. Family bathroom, separate laundry, two toilets. Gas ducted heating is available. This property has recently been freshly painted through out. New carpet has been laid. This property certainly will suit a buyer wanting close access to Westernport Bay and convenience of public transport. Shops are only 100m away from the home!

Address: 2/170 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
Description:
First-Class Townhouse Living - Central Location!
Located in the heart of Crib Point and tucked away for complete peace and privacy, this remarkable residence sets the bar high in terms of comfort, convenience, location and size.
Showcasing multiple indoor and outdoor living spaces, the home features a comfortable formal lounge, adjoining kitchen and dining area, back porch and courtyard.
Those looking to downsize on maintenance but not on space or amenities will appreciate the fabulous kitchen, comprising stainless steel appliances plus plenty of cupboard and bench space.
The laundry is generously-sized and complete with ample cupboards, the family-sized bathroom is well presented and contains a separate bath, shower and adjoining toilet.
The large window attracts natural light into the master bedroom, which boasts a full en-suite and walk-in-robe. There are two generous sized zoned bedrooms with double built-in-robes.
It's the small details that makes this home truly unique, comfort-enhancing inclusions list as; gas ducted heating, split system air-conditioning and remote double.
One of the best features of this home is the location, within walking distance to the cafes, easy access to the railway station, shops, primary schools and only a short drive to some of the best restaurants and wineries the Mornington Peninsula has to offer.
Your search is over-it doesn't get better than this!
Call Jason Dowler on 0403 598 754 to arrange your private inspection or for more information.

Description:
VALUE PLUS!
Looking for a quality three bedroom plus study home in a quiet tranquil location close to quality schools and shopping precincts, then look no further! This home offers one of the best family floor plans available.
Meticulously maintained, this beautifully presented home accentuates the best in modern living. With ducted heating and two x split systems this home will appeal to the most discerning buyer. Size and sophistication are the benchmark when it comes to this family designed home positioning on approx 1200m2.
Formal lounge with bay window and adjoining dining room offers a beautiful subtle touch of class. Separate huge open plan family/meals area off light filled fully appointed kitchen with island bench offers both casual and informal entertaining at its best.
The large master (separate to remaining bedrooms) showcases walking in robe and ensuite, with the second and third bedrooms showcasing a WIR. With two separate living zones, this home is perfect for a large family.
Entertain all year round with the large covered outdoor pergola that overlooks landscaped gardens and a double garage under roof line with rear yard access making this home perfect for the caravan enthusiast or to store trailer or boat. A separate large workshop 7x14 sqm with own access completes this package.
Properties in this prime location are currently being snapped up so be quick to inspect and make this much loved home yours. In close proximity to schools, transport, Peninsula Link, shops, beaches, vibrant cafes, this home ticks all the boxes for families.
